sentences.en: A 40 watt bulb would be quite sufficient and would not obtrude.
sentences.cn: 40瓦的灯泡完全够亮了，并且不会晃眼。

sentences.en: Don't obtrude your ideas upon others.
sentences.cn: 不要将你的观点强加于人.

sentences.en: Don't obtrude your opinions on others.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的观点强加给别人.

sentences.en: He didn't want to obtrude on her privacy.
He persists in obtrude himself despite our effort to get rid of him.
sentences.cn: 尽管我们设法避开他,他还是硬要插进来.

sentences.en: I should not obtrude my affairs so much on the notice of my readers if very particular inquiries had not been made by my townsmen concerning my mode of life.
sentences.cn: 如果我的生活方式已经被我的乡邻们详细的调查出来的话我是不会强迫我的读者来注意我的锁事的。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to obtrude on you at such a late hour.
sentences.cn: 我很抱歉在这麽晚的时刻来叨扰你.

sentences.en: I'm sorry to obtrude on you at such a time.
sentences.cn: 我很抱歉在这个时候打扰你.

sentences.en: It is unwise for an outsider to obtrude his opinions into a family quarrel.
sentences.cn: 局外人硬把自己的想法加入一场家庭争论中是不智的.

sentences.en: There are facts which I would not obtrude upon a child.
sentences.cn: 有些事实不应该强加于儿童.

sentences.en: You had better not obtrude your opinions on [ upon ] others.
sentences.cn: 你最好不要强迫别人接受你的 意见.

sentences.en: You have better not obtrude your opinion upon others.
sentences.cn: 你最好不要强使人接受你的意见.

trans.tran_en: if something obtrudes, or you obtrude something, it becomes noticeable where it is not wanted
